resources.string: Upload a high resolution copy of your organization logo below. Your logo cannot exceed 2MB.
Upload a PDF file of your constitution. The file cannot exceed 2MB.
Upload a PDF file of your by-laws/house rules. The file cannot exceed 2MB.

Upload PDF file of your financial statement for the previous academic year. Your statement must contain itemized income/expenses for each organization activity and the organization\'s total cash on hand. The PDF file cannot exceed 2MB.
